name: music-service-monorepo
description: Full-stack music catalog management system with Python ingestion, TypeScript API, and Astro frontend
author: Alex Immer

scripts.format: npm run format:ts && npm run format:py
scripts.format:py: python -m black scripts/ && python -m isort scripts/
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:ts && npm run format:check:py
scripts.format:check:py: python -m black --check scripts/ && python -m isort --check-only scripts/
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:py
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:ts && npm run lint:fix:py
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:ts && npm run type-check:py
scripts.test: npm run test:ts && npm run test:py
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:ts && npm run test:coverage:py
scripts.dead-code: npm run dead-code:ts && npm run dead-code:py
scripts.security: npm run security:ts && npm run security:py
scripts.security:py: python -m bandit -r scripts/ -c pyproject.toml && pip-audit || true
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.check:quick: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.check:all: npm run check && npm run dead-code && npm run security
scripts.clean: turbo run clean && npm run clean:py && rm -rf node_modules .turbo
scripts.clean:py: find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -type d -name '.pytest_cache' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -type d -name '.mypy_cache' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -type d -name '.ruff_cache' -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf htmlcov .coverage coverage.xml
scripts.python:venv: python -m venv .venv && echo 'Virtual environment created. Activate with: source .venv/bin/activate'
